bibl.title: The First Cataract as a Border between Two Traditions of Architecture?
bibl.note: The first Cataract as a border. - Domestic architecture North and South of the border [from the sixth to the tenth cent. AD]. - Other types of architecture. - The first Cataract as a political border and a cultural bridge.

bibl.title: The First Cataract of the Nile. One Region - Diverse Perspectives
